item.title: What's inside parquet file?
item.description: Intro Recently I’ve visited very interesting website which presents byte by byte what happens when website (data) is sent using TLS. One thing is to know roughly how TLS works and another one is to actually see with explanations what is really happening. Under its influence I thought that I’ve been working with parquet files for some time but I don’t really know their structure. I know its properties, how and when one should use it but I have never really experienced what parquet format really is.
